data.oai_dc:dc: This zip file contains DNA sequence alignments for each of the 57 genetic lineages described in the paper. Sequences headers begin with the genetic lineage name (e.g. GL01a), then the sampling plot (e.g. 02) and finish with the sample number (e.g. ADN543. Sequence header information beginning with MF (e.g. MF31) should be ignored.
